original: 北地泥陽人，西晉官員，傅玄之子。勁直忠果，直言敢諫，也因此時時得罪權貴，屢被彈劾。「了卻官癡」典故出自楊濟與傅咸書。
text: Niyang from Beidi, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty, son of Fu Xuan. Jinzhi is loyal to the fruit, bluntly speaking and daring to advise, and because of this, he always offends the powerful and is repeatedly impeached. The allusion of "Liao Qu Guan Chi" comes from the book of Yang Ji and Fu Xian.
